localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
blogPost.body: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
blogPost.title: Remote - Remote empowers companies to employ global teams compliantly
blogPost.author: Hallie Exall

localize.description: Remote使各种规模的公司都能雇佣全球团队。我们负责处理国际薪资、福利、税收和合规性问题，因此您可以专注于发展您的业务。
localize.tagline: 远程化使企业能够合规地雇佣全球团队。

localize.description: Remote使各種規模的公司都能僱傭全球團隊。我們負責處理國際薪資、福利、稅收和合規性問題，因此您可以專注於發展您的業務。
localize.tagline: 遠程化使企業能夠合規地僱傭全球團隊。

previous.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
previous.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

localize.description: Editable爲你提供了一種最簡單的方式，讓你的視頻直觀地註釋並輕鬆地標記起來。與Photoshop的畫筆或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高質量的設計編輯器不同，它只是提供簡單的註釋體驗。
localize.tagline: 直接對任何視頻文件進行註釋

next.excerpt: MeetingBar shows your calendar events in the status bar. Create and join meetings with one click. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ No data or personal information collection. The app is entirely free and powered by an open-source community. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Works with 30+ meeting services.
next.title: MeetingBar 3.0 - Meetings before your eyes

localize.description: 会议栏在状态栏中显示你的日历事件。一键创建和加入会议。无数据或个人信息收集。该应用完全免费，由开源社区提供技术支持。
會議欄在狀態欄中顯示你的日曆事件。一鍵創建和加入會議。無數據或個人信息收集。該應用完全免費，由開源社區提供技術支持。
